Name: Hexen Hegemony
About the game: The witches, who date back to the dark times of history, were victorious after nine years of fighting against human civilization in 2019. While humanity, which has been defeated because of the irresistible power of the witches' spells, has lost everything and has been taken to the desolate places of the world, this time a great battle for the reign of the world began between the witch clans. 'Magic is not any weapon.' Witch magic is flexible and very diverse. They can be used in virtually any condition and for any purpose. So, you have to think about how to abandon the classical battle logic and to use Mana energy in your blood effectively. Hexen Hegemony is a TPS (Third Person Shooter) game that makes it possible to fight against other witches with hundreds of different magic combinations. Enjoy team strategy, competition and spoils in 4 vs 4 matches. Remember, winners takes everything on the world of hexen.
